name: conchord-ui
description: A UI for the conchord file format

scripts.build: pulp browserify -t app.js -I common && pulp build -m Main -o server-output --src-path server -I common
scripts.dev-server: pulp -w --then "node index" build -m ServerMain -o server-output --src-path server -I common
scripts.release: npm run build && git add app.js -f && git add server-output -f && git commit -m'release' && git push heroku master -f && git reset --hard HEAD^

author: Yannick Dominguez
